options.name: Arcane Mana
options.description: You've learned to tap into pure magical essence, gaining 2 'Mana Points' which can each be used to channel a spell that you know without requiring energy. Mana points completely restore upon completing a full rest.

options.name: Action : Blast
options.description: You make a magical attack with a staff or wand and displace a normal sized creature by either pulling them or pushing them backwards 1 unit if you have at least 2 success dice. For each additional success, you can displace the target another unit. With 4 successes, you can displace a large creature.

options.name: Reaction : Spell Shield
options.description: When you are forced to make a defense check after being targeted by a spell or magical effect, roll a single dice from one of the schools of magic you know and add it to your defense pool.

options.name: Wandlore
options.description: Gain +1 skill with magic. When you touch another staff, wand or weapon with a magical property, you can determine information about it such as what the last spell channeled was, who the owner may have been and how old it is.

options.name: Warlock's Tongue
options.description: Become fluent in one magical language. When you communicate with a creature from another plane that speaks this magical language, you gain a bonus dice to persuasion checks against them.

options.name: Talisman Maker
options.description: You are proficient in imbuing charms into talismans, rings and other jewelry. Gain +1 skill with glyphcraft. When creating accessories with the glyphcraft skill, you can choose to add an additional +1 aether, dark or psychic mitigation to the finished finished product.

options.name: Empowered Mana
options.description: Gain an additional 2 Mana Points. You can use mana points to replace the energy requirement for making magical attacks with wands and staves and gain a bonus dice to the attack roll.

options.name: Shadow Magic
options.description: You have focused your studies on learning powerful curses. Gain +1 skill with black magic.

options.name: Alteration Magic
options.description: You have focus your studies on altering the world around you to suit your needs. Gain +1 skill with meta magic.

options.name: Action : Power Ray
options.description: You make a magical attack with a staff or wand, but instead of a single projectile, the attack is a 10 unit long, 1 unit wide ray, hitting every creature it intersects.
